info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 28 at 3:35PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...Showers and Thunderstorms Capable of Gusty Winds and Hail... Showers and thunderstorms are developing across portions of Southwest and Central Montana this afternoon. These thunderstorms move northeastward through the area, and are capable of producing gusty winds in excess of 40 mph and hail of a half inch in diameter or larger. Remember, when thunder roars, go indoors.
